name: Stremio
short_description: Media center application for streaming movies, TV shows, and video content.
description: Media center application for streaming movies, TV shows, and video content. Stremio is a self-hosted application focused on media, streaming, video, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Stremio on your home server to media center application for streaming movies, tv shows, and video content without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Stremio to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
